name: BATTLOMINO
description:
Features
  • local multiplayer tetris-like game
  • turn based
  • attack the opponent by completing lines until his/her hp reaches zero
  • just remember.. this is a battle without HONOR and HUMANITY
    • reaching the roof does not mean the game is over!
Controls
  • PLAYER RED
    • rotate: W key
    • move left: A key
    • move right: D key
    • move down: S key
    • move all the way down: Q key
  • PLAYER BLUE
    • rotate: I key
    • move left: J key
    • move right: L key
    • move down: K key
    • move all the way down: O key
Credits
  • @myshmeh
  • @Sou_tuhk
